solution_line_template: First find how many orcs there are total by multiplying the number of orcs per squad by the number of squads: {orcs_per_squad} orcs/squad * {num_squads} squads = <<{orcs_per_squad}*{num_squads}={total_orcs}>>{total_orcs} orcs

Then divide the total amount of swords by the number of orcs to find the amount of swords per orc: {total_swords_pounds} pounds / {total_orcs} orcs = <<{total_swords_pounds}/{total_orcs}={pounds_per_orc}>>{pounds_per_orc} pounds/orc
